methods.getAdded:
Fetch the resulting index of added values.

:return: (io.deephaven.db.v2.utils.Index) added index
methods.getModified:
Fetch the resulting index of modified values.

:return: (io.deephaven.db.v2.utils.Index) modified index
methods.getRemoved:
Fetch the resulting index of removed values.

:return: (io.deephaven.db.v2.utils.Index) removed index
methods.validate:
Perform backwards compatible validation checks.

:param sourceIndex: (io.deephaven.db.v2.utils.Index) - the underlying index that apply to added/removed/modified

text:
Expands ShiftAwareListener.onUpdate(ShiftAwareListener.Update)'s Update into a backward compatible ARM
 (added, removed, modified) by expanding keyspace shifts.

 Using this is almost always less efficient than using the Update directly.
